Text.Page:
The sikandaris believe they're waking Sikander to save himâ€”and elevate themselves.

Unfortunately, they're killing our people to do it. They bought Killian's twisted lies and false promises? So be it.

We're not letting them win. Take out the sikandari champions and their stonebeaks.

The sikandaris would make strong allies, if we could trust them. That ship has sailed, though.

Well fought, my friend, but we've more yet to do.
